Mashed_Bloodmoon.LycanthropeTotemDef.label: Huntsman's totem (Endurance)
Mashed_Bloodmoon.LycanthropeTotemDef.description: Proof of a skilled hunter. It gives a bonus to the rate wounds heal while in beast form.\n\nThis totem may also be upgraded through the use of rare crystaline skulls, which can be obtained as a reward from Hound Hunt quests, or during The Huntsman's Moon.
